title: Looking for a Latin font similar to the Chinese system font Li Song Pro
content:
Hi,  
Can anybody help me find a similar font to chinese system font, Li Song Pro..?  
I need a font with all letters, æøå etc., which Li Song Pro don’t have.  
It’s very nice font and would love to use it.

Hope to hear from you.

Best regards,  
Jesper

 [‹ Looking for fonts similar to Accidents Grotesque (irregular grungy sans)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46727 "Go to previous forum topic") [heavenly records ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46737 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jrwmt

comments.content: It looks a lot like an extra light version of ITC Century.
